kunai.name: Kunai
kunai.description: Versatile throwing or close-range knife. Essential ninja tool.

smoke_bomb.name: Smoke Bomb (x1)
smoke_bomb.description: Creates a smokescreen for stealth or escape.

flash_bomb.name: Flash Bomb (x1)
flash_bomb.description: Temporarily blinds enemies. Useful for ambushes or escapes.

explosive_tag.name: Explosive Tag (x1)
explosive_tag.description: Paper tag that explodes after a set time or trigger. Great for traps.

ninja_wire.name: Wire (10m coil)
ninja_wire.description: Thin, durable wire for setting traps or manipulating thrown weapons.

chakra_seal_tag.name: Chakra Seal Tag (x1)
chakra_seal_tag.description: Basic sealing tag used to contain small items or suppress chakra slightly.

empty_scroll.name: Scroll (Empty)
empty_scroll.description: Used to store weapons, tools, or write custom jutsu (RP flavor or utility).

basic_healing_salve.name: Basic Healing Salve
basic_healing_salve.description: Heals minor wounds. Can be used mid-combat or after.

soldier_pill.name: Soldier Pill (x1)
soldier_pill.description: Temporarily boosts stamina and chakra. Side effects if overused.

grappling_hook.name: Grappling Hook
grappling_hook.description: Hook and rope used to scale walls or swing across gaps.

ninja_sandals.name: Ninja Sandals
ninja_sandals.description: Standard footwear. Good grip, noise-dampening soles.

forehead_protector.name: Forehead Protector
forehead_protector.description: Symbol of allegiance. Offers minimal head protection.

chakra_gloves.name: Chakra Gloves
chakra_gloves.description: Light gloves that improve chakra flow for taijutsu or climbing.

basic_armor_vest.name: Basic Armor Vest
basic_armor_vest.description: Light protection vest worn over clothing.

caltrops.name: Caltrops (Set of 10)
caltrops.description: Scattered on ground to slow or injure pursuers.

ink_brush_set.name: Ink & Brush Set
ink_brush_set.description: For writing seals, messages, or jutsu scrolls.

water_canteen.name: Water Canteen
water_canteen.description: Keeps you hydrated on missions. Essential for long treks.

food_rations.name: Food Rations (1 Day)
food_rations.description: Standard mission ration. Restores a small amount of stamina.
